definition: East Turkestan Liberation Organization (ETLO), Chinese dissident group/abbr. for 東突厥斯坦解放組織|东突厥斯坦解放组织
east/host (i.e. sitting on east side of guest)/landlord
to dash/to move forward quickly/to bulge/to protrude/to break through/to rush out/sudden/Taiwan pr. [tu2]

pinyin: Dong1 Tu1 jue2 si1 tan3 Yi1 si1 lan2 Yun4 dong4
containing_words.word: 东突厥斯坦伊斯兰运动

definition: East Turkestan Liberation Organization (ETLO), Xinjiang dissident group
pinyin: Dong1 Tu1 jue2 si1 tan3 Jie3 fang4 Zu3 zhi1

definition: abbr. for 東突厥斯坦解放組織|东突厥斯坦解放组织[Dong1 Tu1 jue2 si1 tan3 Jie3 fang4 Zu3 zhi1], East Turkestan Liberation Organization (ETLO)

sentences.english: The ‘East Turkistan’ separatist forces have made several terrorist attacks within and outside China’s borders.
sentences.chinese: “东突”恐怖势力多次在我国境内外制造恐怖事件。

sentences.english: Secondly, track back to the history of East-Turkestan's evolution.
sentences.chinese: 其次，追溯了“东突”演变的历史。

sentences.english: They asked for road maps from the ETIM as they attempted to cross the border, Wu said.
sentences.chinese: 他们从东突分子手上拿到了路线图来试图穿过边界。

sentences.english: Where do you believe the East Turkistan forces are based?
sentences.chinese: 认为“东突”势力的基地在哪里？

sentences.english: Both Karzai and Tang reiterated their common stance on fighting against East Turkistan terrorists.
sentences.chinese: 双方还重申了坚决打击东突恐怖分子的一致立场。

sentences.english: Qin also briefed on the case of an ETIM organization who was planning a terrorism attack.
sentences.chinese: 秦也简要叙述了东突策划的一次恐怖主义活动。

sentences.english: So the "East Turkistan" terrorists with Osama bin Laden was killed back on it?
sentences.chinese: 那么这些“东突”恐怖分子回流与拉登被击毙有关吗？

sentences.english: Besides, what measures has China adopted to apprehend the heads of the East Turkistan Islamic Movement?
sentences.chinese: 另外，中方采取了哪些措施逮捕“东突”头目？

sentences.english: Experts said the East Turkestan Islamic Movement was believed to be a very small organisation.
sentences.chinese: 专家说，据信东突这个组织的规模非常小。

definition: abbr. for 東突厥斯坦解放組織|东突厥斯坦解放组织[Dong1 Tu1 jue2 si1 tan3 Jie3 fang4 Zu3 zhi1], East Turkestan Liberation Organization (ETLO)
Chechnya, a republic in southwestern Russia/Chechen
abbr. for 世界維吾爾代表大會|世界维吾尔代表大会[Shi4 jie4 Wei2 wu2 er3 Dai4 biao3 Da4 hui4]/World Uighur Congress
abbr. for 東突厥斯坦伊斯蘭運動|东突厥斯坦伊斯兰运动[Dong1 Tu1 jue2 si1 tan3 Yi1 si1 lan2 Yun4 dong4] East Turkestan Islamic Movement (ETIM)
to cross a border (usually illegally)/to sneak in or out of a country
